ayahs.text: yusab~iHu lil~ahi maA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wamaA fiY {lo>aroDi lahu {lomuloku walahu {loHamodu wahuwa EalaY` kul~i $aYo'K qadiyrN
huwa {l~a*iY xalaqakumo faminkumo kaAfirN waminkum m~u&ominN wa{ll~ahu bimaA taEomaluwna baSiyrN
xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa bi{loHaq~i waSaw~arakumo fa>aHosana Suwarakumo wa<ilayohi {lomaSiyru
yaEolamu maA fiY {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wayaEolamu maA tusir~uwna wamaA tuEolinuwna wa{ll~ahu EaliymN[ bi*aAti {lS~uduwri
>alamo ya>otikumo naba&uA@ {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ min qabolu fa*aAquwA@ wabaAla >amorihimo walahumo Ea*aAbN >aliymN
*a`lika bi>an~ahu, kaAnat t~a>otiyhimo rusuluhum bi{lobay~ina`ti faqaAluw^A@ >aba$arN yahoduwnanaA fakafaruwA@ watawal~awA@ w~a{sotagonaY {ll~ahu wa{ll~ahu ganiY~N HamiydN
zaEama {l~a*iyna kafaruw^A@ >an l~an yuboEavuwA@ qulo balaY` warab~iY latuboEavun~a vum~a latunab~a&un~a bimaA Eamilotumo wa*a`lika EalaY {ll~ahi yasiyrN
fa_#aAminuwA@ bi{ll~ahi warasuwlihi. wa{ln~uwri {l~a*iY^ >anzalonaA wa{ll~ahu bimaA taEomaluwna xabiyrN

yawoma yajomaEukumo liyawomi {lojamoEi *a`lika yawomu {lt~agaAbuni waman yu&omin[ bi{ll~ahi wayaEomalo Sa`liHFA yukaf~iro Eanohu say~i_#aAtihi. wayudoxilohu jan~a`tK tajoriY min taHotihaA {lo>anoha`ru xa`lidiyna fiyhaA^ >abadFA *a`lika {lofawozu {loEaZiymu
wa{l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ waka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA^ >uw@la`^}ika >aSoHa`bu {ln~aAri xa`lidiyna fiyhaA wabi}osa {lomaSiyru
maA^ >aSaAba min m~uSiybapK <il~aA bi<i*oni {ll~ahi waman yu&omin[ bi{ll~ahi yahodi qalobahu, wa{ll~ahu bikul~i $aYo'K EaliymN
wa>aTiyEuwA@ {ll~aha wa>aTiyEuwA@ {lr~asuwla fa<in tawal~ayotumo fa<in~amaA EalaY` rasuwlinaA {lobala`gu {lomubiynu
ya`^>ay~uhaA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuw^A@ <in~a mino >azowa`jikumo wa>awola`dikumo Eaduw~FA l~akumo fa{Ho*aruwhumo wa<in taEofuwA@ wataSofaHuwA@ watagofiruwA@ fa<in~a {ll~aha gafuwrN r~aHiymN
fa{t~aquwA@ {ll~aha maA {sotaTaEotumo wa{somaEuwA@ wa>aTiyEuwA@ wa>anfiquwA@ xayorFA l~i>anfusikumo waman yuwqa $uH~a nafosihi. fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lomufoliHuwna
<in tuqoriDuwA@ {ll~aha qaroDFA HasanFA yuDa`Eifohu lakumo wayagofiro lakumo wa{ll~ahu $akuwrN HaliymN
